2802.name: BANNED_ACCOUNT_ALL
2802.message:
This Nintendo Network ID
cannot be used.

Please make a note of the error code
and visit support.nintendo.com
2802.short_description: Your account is permanently banned from all aspects of the network
2802.long_description: Your account is permanently banned from all aspects of the network
2802.short_solution: Don't do whatever you did to get banned
2802.long_solution: Don't do whatever you did to get banned
